text:
questions about docs:
1. what happened to the link to makie gallery? (is the gallery still live?)
2. what is the future of latex labels? (is there any?)
3. why is Basic Tutorial in docs not basic? I mean, just my opinion, but to me basic is "plot a line, add an x and y label", while animations come later. I think if I could find the link to gallery, it wouldn't matter so much...

elements.text: what happened to the link to makie gallery? (is the gallery still live?)
what is the future of latex labels? (is there any?)

why is Basic Tutorial in docs not basic? I mean, just my opinion, but to me basic is "plot a line, add an x and y label", while animations come later. I think if I could find the link to gallery, it wouldn't matter so much...

text: "MakieGallery is deprecated. Testing got moved to AbstractPlotting, and the Makie documentation contains now important examples."

elements.text: "MakieGallery is deprecated. Testing got moved to AbstractPlotting, and the Makie documentation contains now important examples."

text: people have been talking about latex in here, but i forgot what they said. maybe if you ask on discourse we'll get a more persistent/searchable record of the state of things
